channel.title: Suggestions,
channel.description:
One thing I always wanted on RS was a Partyhat, a Purple at the moment they're 1.7B. If anyone has any suggestions on what I can do to make money I would be more than thankful here are my stats
[img]http://puu.sh/3DIew.jpg[/img]
Any suggestions help, the best thing I can think of is Killing Frosts..
Btw my bank is 100mish

item.title: Suggestions,
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:11, topic:525083”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=643775.msg4334106#msg4334106 date=1374077737]
The keys range from 600k - 1m. I get lucky and can get 12 keys in an hour. Also, you can’t solo nex very easily anymore :x
[/quote]
I have people in my clan that say they actively solo nex with bandos gear. Just that it is harder. You can also invest like 25m in tetsu degradeable and it would be a lot easier.[/quote]My maxed friend has told me its actually quite difficult now that the tackle box can’t be used (for those wondering, the champion’s tackle box from the Fish Flinger’s minigame could hold 30 raw fish, which could be eaten through use of the Bunyip’s special move. This, combined with a yak effectively supplied an extra 60 rocktails). If I could learn to solo properly I would love to, but I need to finish making my ascension crossbow first.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions,
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Java-RSPS-Noob:

how do you solo nex :o

shield ultimates. I’ve never tried it to be honest, but most people do duo just because its 10x easier. Just youtube it. They use the magic logs for the lp boost and everything haha.

Read full topic

item.description:

rip4d:

The keys range from 600k - 1m. I get lucky and can get 12 keys in an hour. Also, you can’t solo nex very easily anymore :x

I have people in my clan that say they actively solo nex with bandos gear. Just that it is harder. You can also invest like 25m in tetsu degradeable and it would be a lot easier.

item.title: Suggestions,
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

rip4d:

Farm keystones in the ascension dungeon. I put minimal effort in (was still using abilities though) and managed to pull 8m an hour.

was that at 1m per key?

nex can be done with bandos solo for approx 2.4m per kill.
dragon limbs are dropped 1/100 approx and are worth 21m. if you are good you can get 50 kills per hour and doesn’t need high end gear.
qbd is 5m/hr on average

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_

your tribot account was hacked? or the bot itself?

tribot is good i hear. just check scripts before you use them.

item.title: Suggestions,
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:5, topic:525083”]waste $10 irl. buy tribot vip and buy membership for a throwaway account.
1m os is roughly 10-13m eoc, fair price exchanges can be done over on sythe.

^ easy cash, but not recommened. just not sure if you’re into botting or not.

you could sell floors to noobs if you wanna get that dung up some more (f2p is easier to sell, p2p is better dung xp)[/quote]

I have TriBot but it got like hacked or some shit, what bot do i use regardless?

Read full topic
